languages.text: "Не оказав сопротивление врагам Омниссии, объект Дзета-86 утратил благодать машинного чина и был переведен в статус ресурса мануфакторума. Допущение осквернения и мучений сего ресурса во благо борьбы с ересью не будет считаться грехом или злоумышлением против живой души. По наступлению утраты полезности рекомендовано провести списание объекта".

"In failing to offer any resistance against the enemies of the Omnissiah, Unit Zeta-86 lost the grace of his machine rank and was recategorised as a resource of the manufactorum. The defilement and torment of said resource, if committed to advance the struggle against heresy, will not be deemed an apostasy or malefaction against a living soul. Upon expiry of the unit's utility, disposal is recommended."
languages.original_text: "Не оказав сопротивление врагам Омниссии, объект Дзета-86 утратил благодать машинного чина и был переведен в статус ресурса мануфакторума. Допущение осквернения и мучений сего ресурса во благо борьбы с ересью не будет считаться грехом или злоумышлением против живой души. По наступлению утраты полезности рекомендовано провести списание объекта".

The defilement and torment of said resource, if committed to advance the struggle against heresy, will not be deemed an apostasy or malefaction against a living soul. languages.text: “泽塔86号未能对欧姆尼塞亚的敌人做出任何反抗行为，他已经失去了位列机械行列的权利，已被重新归类为制造工厂的资源。若是出于对付异端分子的目的，而对上述资源进行玷污与折磨，这样的做法将不被视为对活人灵魂的罪过或恶意行为。建议当该个体的效能到期时，将其处理掉。”
languages.original_text: "In failing to offer any resistance against the enemies of the Omnissiah, Unit Zeta-86 lost the grace of his machine rank and was recategorised as a resource of the manufactorum. The defilement and torment of said resource, if committed to advance the struggle against heresy, will not be deemed an apostasy or malefaction against a living soul. Upon expiry of the unit's utility, disposal is recommended."

traits.locale_text: “泽塔86号未能对欧姆尼塞亚的敌人做出任何反抗行为，他已经失去了位列机械行列的权利，已被重新归类为制造工厂的资源。如果是出于对付异端分子的目的，对上述资源的玷污与折磨，将不被视为对活人灵魂的罪过或恶意行为。建议当该个体的效能到期时将其处理掉。”

languages.text: «Debido a su resistencia inexistente frente a los enemigos del Omnissiah, la unidad Zeta-86 pierde la gracia de su rango máquina y queda recategorizada como recurso del manufactorum. La profanación y el tormento de dicho recurso, siempre que sean en pos de la lucha contra la herejía, no se considerarán ni apostasía ni delito contra un alma viva. Cuando la utilidad de la unidad llegue a su fin, se recomienda su pronta eliminación».
languages.original_text: "In failing to offer any resistance against the enemies of the Omnissiah, Unit Zeta-86 lost the grace of his machine rank and was recategorised as a resource of the manufactorum. The defilement and torment of said resource, if committed to advance the struggle against heresy, will not be deemed an apostasy or malefaction against a living soul. Upon expiry of the unit's utility, disposal is recommended."

traits.locale_text: «Debido a su resistencia inexistente frente a los enemigos del Omnissiah, la unidad Zeta-86 pierde la gracia de su rango máquina y queda recategorizada como recurso del manufactorum. La profanación y el tormento de dicho recurso, siempre que sea en pos de la lucha contra la herejía, no se considerará ni pecado ni delito contra un alma viva. Cuando la utilidad de la unidad llegue a su fin, se recomienda su pronta eliminación».

languages.text: 「万機神の敵に抵抗できず、ユニット・ゼータ-86は己の機械団の恩寵を失い、聖工場の資源として再分類された。異端との闘いを前進させるために、この資源を汚し、苦しめても、生きている魂に対する背教行為や悪意とはみなされない。ユニットの有用性が失われた時点で、廃棄することを推奨する」
languages.original_text: "In failing to offer any resistance against the enemies of the Omnissiah, Unit Zeta-86 lost the grace of his machine rank and was recategorised as a resource of the manufactorum. The defilement and torment of said resource, if committed to advance the struggle against heresy, will not be deemed an apostasy or malefaction against a living soul. Upon expiry of the unit's utility, disposal is recommended."

traits.locale_text: 「万機神の敵に抵抗できず、ユニット・ゼータ-86は己の機械団の恩寵を失い、聖工場の資源として再分類された。異端との闘いを前進させるために、この資源を汚し、苦しめても、生きている魂に対する罪や悪意とはみなされない。ユニットの有用性が失われた時点で、廃棄することを推奨する」

languages.text: "In ihrem Versagen, den Feinden des Omnissiah irgendwelchen Widerstand entgegenzusetzen, hat Einheit Zeta-86 ihren Maschinenrang verloren und wurde umkategorisiert – zu einer Ressource des Manufactorums. Die Schändung und Folter besagter Ressource, falls sie den Kampf gegen die Ketzerei voranbringt, gilt nicht als Apostasie oder Übeltat an einer lebenden Seele. Nach Ablauf der Nützlichkeit der Einheit sollte sie entsorgt werden."
languages.original_text: "In failing to offer any resistance against the enemies of the Omnissiah, Unit Zeta-86 lost the grace of his machine rank and was recategorised as a resource of the manufactorum. The defilement and torment of said resource, if committed to advance the struggle against heresy, will not be deemed an apostasy or malefaction against a living soul. Upon expiry of the unit's utility, disposal is recommended."

traits.locale_text: "In ihrem Versagen, den Feinden des Omnissiah irgendwelchen Widerstand entgegenzusetzen, hat Einheit Zeta-86 ihren Maschinenrang verloren und wurde umkategorisiert – zu einer Ressource des Manufactorums. Die Schändung und Folter besagter Ressource, falls sie den Kampf gegen die Ketzerei voranbringt, gilt nicht als Sünde oder Übeltat an einer lebenden Seele. Nach Ablauf der Nützlichkeit der Einheit sollte sie entsorgt werden."

languages.text: « Comme l'unité Zêta-86 n'a pas essayé de résister aux ennemis de l'Omnimessie, elle a perdu la grâce de son rang mécanique et a été rétrogradée à l'état de ressource du manufactorum. Si la profanation et le tourment d'une telle ressource s'avèrent nécessaires dans la lutte contre l'hérésie, ces actes ne seront pas considérés comme une apostasie ou une malfaisance à l'encontre d'une âme vivante. Lorsque cette unité n'aura plus d'utilité, il est recommandé de la mettre au rebut. »
languages.original_text: "In failing to offer any resistance against the enemies of the Omnissiah, Unit Zeta-86 lost the grace of his machine rank and was recategorised as a resource of the manufactorum. The defilement and torment of said resource, if committed to advance the struggle against heresy, will not be deemed an apostasy or malefaction against a living soul. Upon expiry of the unit's utility, disposal is recommended."

traits.locale_text: « Comme l'unité Zêta-86 n'a pas essayé de résister aux ennemis de l'Omnimessie, elle a perdu la grâce de son rang mécanique et a été rétrogradée à l'état de ressource du manufactorum. Si la profanation et le tourment d'une telle ressource s'avèrent nécessaires dans la lutte contre l'hérésie, ces actes ne seront pas considérés comme un péché ou une malfaisance à l'encontre d'une âme vivante. Lorsque cette unité n'aura plus d'utilité, il est recommandé de la mettre au rebut. »

languages.text: "Hermesih'in düşmanlarına karşı hiçbir direniş gösterememesinden ötürü Zeta-86 Birimi, makine rütbesinden düşürülmüş ve manufaktorum kaynağı olarak tekrar sınıflandırılmıştır. Bu kaynağın lekelenmesi ve işkence görmesi, kâfirlikle mücadele uğruna yapılması şartıyla yaşayan bir ruha karşı işlenmiş bir suç veya dinsizlik olarak görülmeyecektir. Birimin işlevini yitirmesi hâlinde imhası öneriliyor."
languages.original_text: "In failing to offer any resistance against the enemies of the Omnissiah, Unit Zeta-86 lost the grace of his machine rank and was recategorised as a resource of the manufactorum. The defilement and torment of said resource, if committed to advance the struggle against heresy, will not be deemed an apostasy or malefaction against a living soul. Upon expiry of the unit's utility, disposal is recommended."

Bu kaynağın lekelenmesi ve işkence görmesi, kâfirlikle mücadele uğruna yapılması şartıyla yaşayan bir ruha karşı işlenmiş bir suç veya dinsizlik olarak görülmeyecektir. Birimin işlevini yitirmesi hâlinde imhası öneriliyor."
